resources.string: Code Crusher is a computer science Quiz designed to test even the toughest coders. This quiz focuses on mobile development, but future Quiz will test you on a variety of skills. Now can you Crush the Code?
Which of these programming languages is used to make phone apps?
Which is the right way to instantiate an object?
